pli-tv-pvr2.8:1.1_0: Avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantī kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.8:1.2_0: Avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantī tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.8:1.3_0: Adhakkhakaṁ ubbhajāṇumaṇḍalaṁ gahaṇaṁ sādiyati, āpatti pārājikassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.8:1.4_0: ubbhakkhakaṁ adhojāṇumaṇḍalaṁ gahaṇaṁ sādiyati, āpatti thullaccayassa;
pli-tv-pvr2.8:1.6_0: avassutā bhikkhunī avassutassa purisapuggalassa kāyasaṁsaggaṁ sādiyantī imā tisso āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.8:2.1_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.8:2.6_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ dve vipattiyo bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.8:2.9_0: siyā pārājikāpattikkhandhena, siyā thullaccayāpattikkhandhena, siyā dukkaṭāpattikkhandhena.
pli-tv-pvr2.8:2.11_0: kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti, na vācato.
pli-tv-pvr2.8:2.14_0: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca …pe….
pli-tv-pvr2.8:3.1_0: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantī kati āpattiyo āpajjati?
pli-tv-pvr2.8:3.2_0: Dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantī dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.8:3.5_0: dadhiṁ viññāpetvā bhuñjantī imā dve āpattiyo āpajjati.
pli-tv-pvr2.8:4.1_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ kati vipattiyo bhajanti?
pli-tv-pvr2.8:4.6_0: Tā āpattiyo catunnaṁ vipattīnaṁ ekaṁ vipattiṁ bhajanti—
pli-tv-pvr2.8:4.11_0: siyā kāyato samuṭṭhanti na vācato na cittato,
pli-tv-pvr2.8:4.12_0: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca samuṭṭhanti na cittato,
pli-tv-pvr2.8:4.13_0: siyā kāyato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti na vācato,
pli-tv-pvr2.8:4.14_0: siyā kāyato ca vācato ca cittato ca samuṭṭhanti.
pli-tv-pvr2.8:4.17_0: siyā sammukhāvinayena ca paṭiññātakaraṇena ca, siyā sammukhāvinayena ca tiṇavatthārakena ca.
